pr_title: DHFPROD-4866: Fix placement of ellipsis for array values

timeline.bodyText: This file is only used for testing, right? I recommend adding the word "test" to it somewhere - my first though on seeing this was - why isn't the server providing this data to the UI? But I believe it's just mock data for testing purposes. The filename should imply that.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4866-Fix placement of ellipsis for array values
DHFPROD-4866-Fix placement of ellipsis for array values

timeline.bodyText: can we create a separate test and use an inline jsonResponse object particular to the test. This is going to affect the sorting tests. Are all the unit tests passing with this change locally?
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: This test can rerender with 3 different responses like the screenshots above.
replies.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: Only 2 pertain to this bug for data type array. First screenshot doesn't apply. I have added tests with data pertaining only to this bug
replies.author: srinathgit
